Module kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem
Package kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem.util

Class FeedbackMessage

java.lang.Object
kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem.util.FeedbackMessage
public final class FeedbackMessage extends Object
A static utility class of reusable error messages for console and GUI. Used in conjunction with Handler subclasses.
Author:
Timothy Albert Kline
